title: About me
text: Anxo Sánchez: I’m a Full Professor at the University of Vigo Chemical Engineering Department.

text:

title: About me
text:
Research
My Research Fields are: - Biomass Energy - Hydrogen Technologies - Sustainable Chemical Processes Design and Simulation, specially - Green Solvents
